DOC.brief_summary: Recently epiaortic ultrasound scanning (EAS) has been recommended as an intraoperative tool to accurately assess ascending aorta disease. To date, several studies have reported that EAS is superior to TEE and surgical palpation
DOC.brief_title: Intraoperative Epiaortic Scanning for Preventing Early Stroke After Off-pump Coronary Artery Bypass
DOC.criteria: patients underwent who isolated offpump coronary artery bypass 1. combined carotid procedures 2. preoperative cerebral haemorrhage 3. nonoperative unstable vital signs such as ventricular fibrillation or cardiac arrest
